skyproc.gui

Class SPProgressBarPlug

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyproc.gui.SPProgressBarPlug

  • public class SPProgressBarPlug
extends java.lang.Object
    A boundary class that lets SkyProcs importing interface with custom GUIs

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addProgressBar(lev.gui.LProgressBarInterface progressBar)
      Adds a progress bar to the list of bars to be updated with SkyProc import/export data.

      Sets the current value to the max value (100%).

      Updates the progress bar status text to display:
      ([cur]/[max]) [status]
      static void setStatusNumbered(java.lang.String status)
      Updates the progress bar status text to display the current step in the form of:
      ([cur]/[max]) [status]
